main event: A glowing disc-shaped object surrounded by a tremendous light was observed in Freiburg, Germany on 20 March 1959.
interesting points: The object was seen by a weather observer at the Freiburg Weather Bureau and two American physics students,The object was reported to be shining and glowing,The sighting occurred at 2322 hours from North North West to South South East,The light emitted by the object gradually faded from sight, The report implies the object was unidentified with possible classifications as a balloon, aircraft, or astronomical phenomenon.
sighted object: a glowing disc-shaped object surrounded by light
witness description: a weather observer and two American physics students
